Package it.polimi.ingsw.psp12.model.power

Class ExtendedPowerDecorator

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.psp12.model.power.Power
it.polimi.ingsw.psp12.model.power.ExtendedPowerDecorator
Direct Known Subclasses:
BuildAgainDecorator, BuildBeforeMoveAgainDecorator, BuildUpAgainDecorator, DomeAnyLevelDecorator, JumpToWinDecorator, MoveAgainDecorator, NextCannotMoveUpDecorator, PushAwayWorkerDecorator, SwapWorkersDecorator
public abstract class ExtendedPowerDecorator
extends Power
Abstract decorator that will be used as interface implemented by each decorator
Author:
Michele Lucio, Luca Morandini
